intervention_catalogue.name: Accommodation services
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Accommodation services provide short-term housing and support to help men on probation find stable, long-term accommodation.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Accommodation services provide short-term housing and support to help men on probation find stable, long-term accommodation.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: The type, number and length of sessions can vary, depending on the location and service provider.

delivery_methods.attendance_type:
Variable
(face-to-face, virtual, telephone, email, messaging) *Accomodation services West Midlands

possible_outcomes: Accommodation services aim to achieve one or more of the following outcomes:
• removing barriers to finding or keeping accommodation, like money problems, behaviour, health or past offences
• preventing homelessness, including support to help stop an eviction
• helping find and secure social or supported housing
• finding tenancy in the private rented sector, or keeping existing tenancy
• having stable housing or having a strong prospect of keeping stable housing for at least 3 months - this includes men who have been in prison for less than 6 months
